basics.name: Director Of Information Technology
basics.summary: A solutions-oriented professional with solid experience in various IT environments including but not limited to Leadership, Communication, and Expertise.

work.name: Adsystech
work.summary: Hired to design, and deploy the first data center the company owned in order to deploy a new offering, an enterprise Software as a Service (SaaS) product.
highlights: Designed data center from the ground up
Created cyber security policies and controls
Put together a team to support the data center
Provided technical support for the new product offering

work.name: County Human Service Programs
work.summary: Responsible for managing +120 Million dollars for support of County Wide Human Service programs.
highlights: Identified, evaluated and lead a bi-County steering committee in all technical aspect
Managed a project support team including administrators, help desk staff and trainers
Evaluated the security risks, ensuring HITECH/HIPAA protocol were followed

work.name: Relax the Back
work.summary: Responsible for the overall management of the National point of sale network at 100+ retail locations and 5 distribution centers.
highlights: Responsible for infrastructure and strategic planning
Liaison between vendors, operation staff and the CFO for all major projects on time and on budget
Managed the ERP solution at the manufacturing plant
Managed the accounting and HR systems at the corporate office

education.institution: Fullerton Masters of Science Degree , Information Technology Mihaylo College of Business and Economics
Bachelors of Science Degree , Information Technology University of Phoenix

skills.name: Expertise
